revision.text: ===Tier=== Dungeon chest loot is classified as belonging to a specific '''Tier''' of loot in a Dungeon. The Tier of a loot-able item indicates the Rarity of obtaining that item from a Chest. Loot is classified into 5 tier types: Common, Rare, Epic, Legendary and Mythic from least rare to most rare. Additionally, loot items can have '''weights''' inside of their tier. Items with a higher weight in a tier have greater odds of dropping than lower weight items in a tier. Loot items have a base weight of 1. The below table explains the cumulative chance of finding an item in a particular tier.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
